programming-languages: Advanced proficiency in programming languages: C#, C, Python, Java etc..
web-dev: Experience in web development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, with and without frameworks like React, Bootstrap and Angular.
embedded-systems: Extensive practical experience in hardware and firmware development for embedded systems , with emphasis on the use of the Arduino platform and C++ programming.
it-os-network-hardware: In-depth mastery of IT, operating systems, computer networks, and hardware.
sql: Practical knowledge of SQL and RDBs: SQL Server, Oracle DB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite.
rest-apis: Skilled in developing and consuming REST APIs, with a focus on the ASP.NET framework.
software-engineering-git: Solid understanding and experience in Software Engineering, good development practices , and version control with Git and GitHub.
personal-introduction:
I am 22 years old and a Programmer Analyst at WriteSys Traffic Systems, where I am a full-stack developer and work with C# + .NET, TypeScript + Angular e SQL. I am also in my last semester of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering.

I have always been passionate about technology and naturally curious, always willing to learn more and explore new innovations and trends. Within this passion, my affinity for programming stands out, especially with the C# language and the .NET framework, with which I have experience developing Web and Desktop applications. As an example, I worked on the development of a complete web system for managing inventory, products, employees, and orders . This open-source application, available on GitHub, was built with REST APIs in C# + ASP.NET and SQL Server on the back-end , and a responsive front-end in TypeScript + React and Bootstrap .

As a hobby, I am also interested in 3D, both 3D art (especially using Blender) and 3D printing; both of which I have experience with.
about-this-website-info:
This personal website is where you can find my info and some of my projects (related to software, harware and engineering), and see some of the artwork of questionable quality I've created in my spare time. Here you can also find links to my socials and see my contact info. Feel free to follow me around and reach out if you have any questions, opportunities or inquiries, both personal and professional.

The website was built from scratch by me, using Angular v20, TypeScript and Sass (SCSS). For some of the components and theming, I used Angular Material. For internalization and localization I am using Transloco. The source code of the website is on GitHub. Feel free to make suggestions and contributions, or fork the repository to use as a template, just please credit me with the proper attribution if you do that.
